content:
This time, the interlocutor is from the IT industry. She was once imprisoned because the software designed by her company was used by criminals for fraud. She spent a month in a detention center in a small city in the northeast.
She shared with us her experiences in the detention center: every night when sleeping, the prisoners need to take turns on duty to prevent others from committing suicide. Even when going to the toilet, there needs to be someone standing opposite and staring at you.....

name: æè€å¸ˆä¸æ˜¯ä½ è€å¸ˆ
content:
Zhengzhou citizens mourned Li Keqiang online.
It is reported that Li Keqiang served as the governor and secretary of the Henan Provincial Party Committee. During his tenure in Henan, he led the planning and construction of the Zhengdong New District. The Zhengdong New District includes the highest-level central business district in Zhengzhou and Henan, and plays a vital role in the development of Zhengzhou in the 2010s. At present, many Zhengzhou netizens have expressed their nostalgia for the "planner" of the Zhengdong New District and thanked him for his contribution to Henan.
